title: Wadi Bastura Tunnel Inscription
description: Several stone blocks forming the entrance to a tunnel make up part of an aqueduct that Sennacherib had built to divert water from the Bastura River (a tributary of the Upper Zab) to Arbela, a principal cult city of the goddess IÅ¡tar. One ashlar block bears an eight-line inscription recording the construction of a (subterranean) watercourse.

properties.description: Representative location based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Bastura Tunnel
